i mean that lists the daemons running
ps -ef
and can stop or start  , restart etc..
you can use the init scripts to restart services - like /etc/init.d/apache2 restart
but it won't be permanent right?
if you stop a service with an init script it will be restarted on bootup
there's some configuration you can do in Administration->services that will make it permanent
